results.name: Signal Prime Messenger
results.description: End-to-end encrypted messaging with a focus on absolute privacy. Powered by the Signal Protocol, Prime offers anonymous sign-up, sealed sender technology, and self-destructing messages. No ads, no trackers, no compromises.

results.name: Torus Browser (Onion)
results.description: Browse the internet with maximum anonymity. Torus routes your traffic through the Tor network, blocking trackers and resisting surveillance. Features multi-layer encryption and bridges for censored networks.

results.name: Vaultwarden Passkeys
results.description: A secure and open-source password manager. Store all your logins, passkeys, and secure notes in an encrypted vault. Features autofill, password generation, and security audits. Your data is zero-knowledge encrypted.

results.name: Mullvad VPN+
results.description: A trustworthy VPN that puts your privacy first. We don't keep activity logs and don't require personal information to create an account. Pay with cash or crypto for full anonymity. Audited and proven.

results.name: Cryptomator Vault
results.description: Transparent, client-side encryption for your cloud files. Create encrypted 'vaults' in your cloud storage (like Google Drive, Dropbox) and access them securely. Your cloud provider only sees gibberish.
